10	mushroom
11	wooden axe
12	stone axe

16	gold axe
17	titanium axe
18	diamond axe

addGameItem(new Item(0, "Wooden Pickaxe", "A basic pickaxe.", "cache/graphics/items/0.png", 5, 12, false, true));
